resources.string: Give the user a 2nd chance to appear in your Real Review list by suggesting that they update their video. Don\'t worry, users can only see the total number of 2nd Chances they have been given on their profile, not who they came from.
Change your search criteria by pressing the icon!
Well done, you\'re all set up. We\'ve already found some matches for you. The buttons below interact with each match..
Tap Keep if you would like the opportunity to be matched with this user and they will be added to your Real Potential list until they have reviewed your profile.
Click Cut if it\'s not a match for you. This user will not appear in your Real Review list anymore.
This button will bring you to the edit page, where you can update your ShowReal and profile information.

See how many users have viewed your video and how many 2nd Chances you\’ve been given. Remember when you re-do your ShowReal, users that gave you a 2nd Chance will see your new ShowReal when it\'s published.
